sources.title: Trail of the Silver Spurs (1941) THE RANGE BUSTERS
sources.description:
Stars: Ray Corrigan, John 'Dusty' King, Max Terhune
Director: S. Roy Luby

The Range Busters investigate a  gold robbery from the Denver Mint in a supposedly deserted Arizona ghost town, but they soon find they're not the only residents with a nose for gold.

metadata.Plot: The Range Busters are after Jingler and the gold taken from the Denver mint. They travel to Bottleneck only to find it a ghost town. But after Alibi salts the mine, Bottleneck quickly becomes a boom town.
metadata.Actors: Ray Corrigan, John 'Dusty' King, Max Terhune
